Summary: Red/pink orb with tail flew from East to West right over wife and self
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Wayne
There were no other sightings in Fort Wayne on or around September 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWife Judy and I were putting items from garage sale back in garage from drivway. Wife saw it first and said look east in sky. There was this reddish object flying right over our driveway. It was soundless and pulsated some or blinked slightly. It covered distznce from treeline to treeline in approx 5 to 10 seconds; would guess about 6 0r 7. It did not have any navigational or blinking lights. Looked like a hot air bzloon elongated. We live on east side of city in Georgetown area and feel others must have seen it also as it was about 8;45 PM on a clear but dark Saturday night. Any other Fort Wayne reports collborating this sighting?? Thank you. PS Tried to also contact "UFOCasebook.com" which I check every so often but was unable to get their "contact us" link to cooperate.
